BEAUTY BASICS with Nurberxo | Sunless Tanning

SUNLESS TANNING....We've all been there, looked at our pale post winter skin and opted for a quick fake fix, but maybe not executed it in the best way -- yes I'm talking about orange hands and streaks. So with the summer just around the corner we've got you covered with our tips and tricks for getting the best results with your sunless tanner.  Read more http://gohsn.co/tBkc

SUNLESS TANNING:  Tips and Tricks

Step 1:
-Exfoliation removes the dead skin

Step 2:
-Shave before you apply the product
-Don't moisturize too soon prior to applying product

Step 3:
-Apply moisturizer in drier areas
asset.author: HSN
